participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
i like to create websites.
I do my best to support my family and be there for them.
my major was american literature and education.

participant_2.background:
I try to do laundry at least once a week, but it can be hard to find the time.
my favorite artist is 2pac.
I am not wealthy but I do enjoy eating expensive seafood.
I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters.
i love going to concerts.

content.text: Nice to meet you! What are some of your interests?
I enjoy going to concerts, using my imagination to create new worlds and characters, and eating expensive seafood.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I like to create websites and I'm trying to get back into reading more.
That's awesome! I love reading as well. What are some of your favorite books?
I really enjoyed "The Great Gatsby" and "To Kill a Mockingbird."
Those are both great books! I also love "The Catcher in the Rye."
I've never read that one, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a classic for a reason! I highly recommend it.
I'll check it out! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good day.
